name: Astro (itch) (and one)
description:
Creator:

  • "and one" @ https://and-one.itch.io/

Summary:

Hi! This is the first game that I've ever created. It's a 2D-pixel top down shooter that takes place in space. You play as the hero who is faced with surviving an alien invasion. Survive the 5 thirty-second rounds and you will have saved the galaxy from its destruction.

Credits:

  • MAJORITY OF ASSETS/SOUNDS PROVIDED BY: http://superpowers-html5.com/
  • GAMEOVER MUSIC BY: Cleyton Kauffman @ https://soundcloud.com/cleytonkauffman
  • additional gun sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com
